name: T - Emily Sonia
_source: speak;Sonia; Well, look at this little girl fight!{w} I always love the fire in your eyes, kid!
speak;Emily; These bastards killed my friends{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I'm going to clean the streets with their blood{tgm}...

speak;Sonia; I love the spirit, I really do!{w} You remind me of myself at your age, but maybe dial it back a bit.{w}{c:expression;Sonia;NoSmile} You won't be any good if you don't put at least some thought into your attack.
speak;Emily; Now you're starting to sound like Emma and Mom.
speak;Sonia; Maybe they've got a point.{w} One day you'll find out that all arm and no head is going to end up messy.{w} Just keep your temper in check.
